title: Shut down when AR is less than AVC

content.question: In order to minimize short-run losses, a profit-maximizing firm will necessarily shut down production under which of the following conditions?

choices.label: Total revenue is less than total cost.
Marginal cost is greater than average total cost.
Marginal cost is less than marginal revenue.
Average revenue is less than average variable cost.
Average revenue is less than average total cost.

content.answer: Average revenue is less than average variable cost.
